definitions.title: f.
definitions.body: [[דָּח]]; only Ezr; Dn uses [[דִּכֵּן]] (Eg. and Cappad. Aram. [[זך]] (CIS:ii. 151 RÉS:361 B S-C:Pap. (f. [[דכא]], [[דכי]] ib.:F 6, 9), Lzb:Eph. i. 67); Targum [[דֵּיכֵי]], f. [[דָּח]]; Ar. d-a0ka; Eth. znku: From d-a0 [[זֶה]], [[דָּא]] (f.), with the affix [[ך]] (W:CG 110), thus lit. = Germ. dieser da. The pl. is [[אִלֵּח]], q.v.);—this (always after its subst.), Ezr 5:16 [[שֵׁשְׁבַּצַּר דֵח]], v:Ezr 5:17 [[בֵּית־אֱלָהָא דֵח]], Ezr 6:7, Ezr 6:8, Ezr 6:12; f. Ezr 4:13, Ezr 4:15, Ezr 4:16, Ezr 4:16, Ezr 4:19, Ezr 4:21 all [[קִרְיְתָא דָח]], Ezr 5:8. p. 1080
